titleStmt.title: Commemoration of the thirtieth day of January, 1648 being the day of the martyrdom of King Charles the First, and fit to be considered upon the anniversary fast for the same / by the same hand as wrote Vox populi, or, Englands lamentation.
titleStmt.author: Same hand as wrote Vox populi.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
